flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: At first sight, POOCHYENA takes a bitenat anything that moves.nThis POKéMON chases after prey untilfthe victim becomes exhausted.nHowever, it may turn tail if the preynstrikes back.

POOCHYENA is an omnivore - it will eatnanything. A distinguishing feature isnhow large its fangs are compared tofits body. This POKéMON tries tonintimidate its foes by making the hairnon its tail bristle out.
It savagely threatens foes with barednfangs. It chases after fleeing targetsntenaciously. It turns tail and runs,nhowever, if the foe strikes back.
It has a very tenacious nature. Its acutensense of smell lets it chase a chosennprey without ever losing track.
It has a very tenacious nature. Its acutensense of smell lets it chase a chosennprey without ever losing track.
A Pokémon with a persistentnnature, it chases its chosen preynuntil the prey becomes exhausted.
A Pokémon with a persistentnnature, it chases its chosen preynuntil the prey becomes exhausted.
A Pokémon with a persistentnnature, it chases its chosen preynuntil the prey becomes exhausted.
It chases its prey until the victimnbecomes exhausted. However, itnturns tail if the prey strikes back.
It chases its prey until the victimnbecomes exhausted. However, itnturns tail if the prey strikes back.
Un Pokémon très obstiné quinpoursuit sa proie jusqu’à cenqu’elle soit épuisée.
A Pokémon with a persistentnnature, it chases its chosen preynuntil the prey becomes exhausted.
Un Pokémon très obstiné quinpoursuit sa proie jusqu’à cenqu’elle soit épuisée.
A Pokémon with a persistentnnature, it chases its chosen preynuntil the prey becomes exhausted.
A Pokémon with a persistentnnature, it chases its chosen preynuntil the prey becomes exhausted.
A Pokémon with a persistentnnature, it chases its chosen preynuntil the prey becomes exhausted.
しつこい　せいかくの　ポケモン。nめをつけた　えものが　ヘトヘトにnつかれるまで　おいかけまわす。
집요한 성격의 포켓몬이다.n점찍은 먹이가 기진맥진n지칠 때까지 뒤쫓아간다.
Un Pokémon très obstiné qui poursuit sa proie jusqu’ànce qu’elle soit épuisée.
Ein beharrliches Pokémon, das seine Beute jagt,nbis diese erschöpft ist.
Es muy persistente. Si se fija en una presa, no landejará hasta que caiga agotada.
Pokémon di natura ostinata. Insegue la predanprescelta finché questa non è esausta.
A Pokémon with a persistent nature, it chases itsnchosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.
しつこい　性格の　ポケモン。n目をつけた　獲物が　ヘトヘトにn疲れるまで　追いかけ回す。
するどい　きゅうかくで　ねらったnえものは　ぜったいに　にがさない。nとっても　しつこい　せいかくだ。
날카로운 후각으로 노린n먹이는 절대로 놓치지 않는다.n매우 끈질긴 성격이다.
Medhyèna est d’un tempérament tenace.nSon odorat très développé lui permet de ne jamaisnperdre la trace de sa proie.
Es hat ein hartnäckiges Wesen. Sein präzisernGeruchssinn ermöglicht ihm, seiner Beutennachzujagen, ohne die Fährte zu verlieren.
Es tenaz por naturaleza. Tiene un sentido del olfatontan agudo que nunca se le escapa la presa que quiere.
Pokémon molto tenace. L’olfatto sviluppatissimo glinpermette di seguire una preda senza mai perdernenle tracce.
It has a very tenacious nature. Its acute sense ofnsmell lets it chase a chosen prey without evernlosing track.
鋭い　きゅうかくで　ねらった　獲物はn絶対に　逃がさない。nとっても　しつこい　性格だ。
うごく　ものを　みつけると　すぐに　かみつく。nえものが　ヘトヘトに　なるまで　おいかけまわすがnはんげきされると　しりごみする　ことも　あるよ。
움직이는 것을 발견하면 바로 문다.n먹이가 기진맥진해질 때까지 쫓아다니지만n반격당하면 뒷걸음치기도 한다.

Sans se poser de questions, Medhyèna essaie de mordrentout ce qui bouge. Ce Pokémon pourchasse sa proie jusqu’ànce qu’elle s’épuise. Cependant, il se peut qu’il prenne peurnet s’enfuie si la proie riposte.

Sobald Fiffyen eine Bewegung wahrnimmt, schnappt es zu.nEs jagt seine Beute so lange, bis sie vollkommen erschöpft ist.nWenn sich die Beute allerdings wehrt, kann es passieren,ndass Fiffyen klein beigibt und flieht.

La primera reacción que Poochyena tiene al ver algo moversenes darle un mordisco. Este Pokémon persigue a su presa hastanque cae agotada. Aunque, a veces, sale huyendo si su presanle responde con un ataque.
Poochyena azzanna al minimo movimento senza riflettere.nCaccia la sua preda finché questa non è tanto stancanda cedere. Tuttavia, se il nemico contrattacca, Poochyenantalvolta scappa.
At first sight, Poochyena takes a bite at anything that moves.nThis Pokémon chases after prey until the victim becomesnexhausted. However, it may turn tail if the prey strikes back.
動く　ものを　見つけると　すぐに　かみつく。n獲物が　ヘトヘトに　なるまで　追いかけ回すがn反撃されると　尻ごみする　ことも　あるよ。
なんでも　たべる　ざっしょくせいの　ポケモン。nからだに　くらべ　おおきな　キバが　とくちょう。nしっぽの　けを　さかだてて　てきを　いかくする。
무엇이든 먹는 잡식성인 포켓몬이다.n몸에 비해 큰 이빨이 특징이다.n꼬리의 털을 세우고 적을 위협한다.
Medhyèna est omnivore. Il mange de tout. Ses crocs sontntrès gros, comparés à son corps. Ce Pokémon essaiend’intimider ses ennemis en hérissant les poils de sa queue.

Fiffyen ist ein Allesfresser. Auffällig an diesem Pokémonnist das Verhältnis seiner Körpergröße zur Länge seiner Zähne.nEs versucht Feinde einzuschüchtern, indem es die Haarenan seinem Schweif abstehen lässt.

Poochyena es un Pokémon omnívoro. Se come lo que sea.nLe caracteriza el gran tamaño de sus colmillos respecto alnresto del cuerpo. Este Pokémon hace que se le erice la colanpara intentar intimidar a su rival.
Poochyena è onnivoro: mangia di tutto. Una caratteristicandistintiva è la dimensione delle zanne rispetto al corpo.nCerca di intimidire i nemici rizzando il pelo della coda.

Poochyena is an omnivore—it will eat anything. A distinguishingnfeature is how large its fangs are compared to its body. ThisnPokémon tries to intimidate its foes by making the hair on itsntail bristle out.
なんでも　食べる　雑食性の　ポケモン。n体に　比べ　大きな　キバが　特徴。n尻尾の　毛を　逆立てて　敵を　威嚇する。
